audio_file: Relay the message May Anne aying daisy lucas 645191519232 020625.wav

transcription.text: Hello po, good morning po, Ma'am Daisy. Hello po.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Hello.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Apo, Ma'am Daisy. By the way po, si Ray and I yung tumam-tum credit max calling in the help of Maya Bank over the recorded line. Before you proceed po, for your account security, please verify, last 4 digit po ng mobile number nyo na nakaregister kay Maya Bank is 2797 po.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Ano pa?
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: 2797 po, last 4 digit ng mobile number nyo na nakaregister kay Maya Bank po.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Apo.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Okay, thank you for confirming, Ma'am. As per checking dito sa account kay Maya Personal Loan, nag-15 days past yung ka-yesterday amounting 8,880.50 po. Aska lang po ano po naging reason but until now, pwede pa rin tayo nakapag-proceed ng payment po.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Ano? Nagalig po kasi yung ano, yung sahod ko.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Ah, okay. So waiting for salary time, Ma'am. And today naman po, kaya naman na po ba natin siyang masettle po or nasettle na siya, Ma'am?
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Kaya naman siya this ano, coming 21.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: This, February 21 po?
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Yes po, kasi po ayun po yung judicia ulit eh, so ipigil na po namin lahat
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Opo, kasi ganito, Ma'am. Opo, yung once na na-delete kayo ng payment, automatic na nagkakombine yung 2-month amortization mo dyan sa dashboard mo.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: ng ano.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: But that doesn't mean naman po na kailangan mo siyang isettle kung ano po yung due date na nakikita mo na dyan sa dashboard ninyo.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: etics.com
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Today kasi po, yung updated amount as per Maya na kailangan ninyong masettle po is 8,880.50 which is today nyo po siya kailangan masettle po para mag-update po yung account and mag-stop na po siya na magranas. And even though naman po na may kasama ito na principal due, gawa nga po na nag-rate payment tayo and na meron po siyang 0.17% daily po na penalty, makikredit pa rin naman po siya sa account nyo. Kailangan lang po talaga siyang masettle today po para mag-update po yung account and mag-stop na po siya na magranas.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Okay po, sige po
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: So kaya naman na po natin siyang isettle today, Ma'am?
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Yes po
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Okay po. So mga what time po natin siya masisettle?
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Baka ngayon na
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Right after the call po. Okay po. So gawan ko na lang din po siya ng report po. Give an email naman po natin dito is still active, jdong425 at gmail.com po.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Ay wait lang, pwede ba siya ano Pwede ba siya sa Mamaya, ganon
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Ano po?
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Pwede ba siya mamaya
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Mamaya ang gabi po?
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Yes po
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Si Ma'am Daisy po ba itong kausap po?
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Anak po
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Anak po? Okay. Nasaan po si Ma'am Daisy?
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Wala po nasa tentahan po eh
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: O po, si Ma'am Daisy po kasi sana yung kailangan makausap po. Nag-agree po kayo kanina na kayo po si Ma'am Daisy.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Anak po
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Kaya po nakapag-disclose kami.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Anak po
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Sige, ganito na lang siya. Hindi po kasi kami allowed mag-disclose po ng any information.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Pasuin na lang po. Paralay na lang muna kami ng message. Na tumawag si Credit Max regarding lang po sa Maya Bank niya.

transcription.text: Anak po Anak po Anak po Anak po Anak po
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: And sa susunod na lang din po, once po na may magtanong sa inyo po kung si Ma'am Daisy na po,
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Anak po

transcription.text: pa-verify na lang agad sir kung hindi po kayo. Para hindi na lang din po makapag-disclose ng any information po.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Okay lang po yun Kasi ako din naman po Nagbibigay kay mommy Ng anong panuulog niya
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Opo. Kasi sir, yung name po kasi ni Ma'am yung nakalagay po dito eh. So kung gusto niyo po na kayo po yung makausap namin sir, pwede naman po yan.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Anak po Anak po
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Kung halimbawa po nandyan si Ma'am sa kabilang line,
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: pwede naman po niya sabihin na in-authorize niya kayo na makausap po regarding dito. Or kung pwede rin po na mag-send siya ng authorization letter through email po. Kasi protocol din po talaga siya dito sir. Bawal po kami mag-disclose po ng any information hanggat wala pong authorization po.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Okay.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Opo. So ayun na lang po muna today po. Kindly relay the message po na tumawag si Credit Max regarding lang po sa Maya Bank. Okay po. Thank you po.

translation.tagalog: Hello po, good morning po, Ma'am Daisy. Hello po.
translation.english: Hello, good morning, Ma'am Daisy. Hello.

translation.tagalog: Hello.
translation.english: Hello.

translation.tagalog: Apo, Ma'am Daisy. By the way po, si Ray and I yung tumam-tum credit max calling in the help of Maya Bank over the recorded line. Before you proceed po, for your account security, please verify, last 4 digit po ng mobile number nyo na nakaregister kay Maya Bank is 2797 po.
translation.english: Yes, Ma'am Daisy. By the way, this is Ray from Credit Max calling on behalf of Maya Bank over the recorded line. Before we proceed, for your account security, please verify if the last 4 digits of your mobile number registered with Maya Bank is 2797.

translation.tagalog: Ano pa?
translation.english: What was that?

translation.tagalog: 2797 po, last 4 digit ng mobile number nyo na nakaregister kay Maya Bank po.
translation.english: 2797, the last 4 digits of your mobile number registered with Maya Bank.

translation.tagalog: Apo.
translation.english: Yes.

translation.tagalog: Okay, thank you for confirming, Ma'am. As per checking dito sa account kay Maya Personal Loan, nag-15 days past yung ka-yesterday amounting 8,880.50 po. Aska lang po ano po naging reason but until now, pwede pa rin tayo nakapag-proceed ng payment po.
translation.english: Okay, thank you for confirming, Ma'am. As per checking your Maya Personal Loan account, it’s already 15 days past due as of yesterday, amounting to 8,880.50. May I ask why the payment hasn't been made yet?

translation.tagalog: Ano? Nagalig po kasi yung ano, yung sahod ko.
translation.english: Well, my salary was delayed.

translation.tagalog: Ah, okay. So waiting for salary time, Ma'am. And today naman po, kaya naman na po ba natin siyang masettle po or nasettle na siya, Ma'am?
translation.english: Ah, okay. So you’re waiting for your salary. How about today, Ma'am? Will you be able to settle it today, or has it been settled already?

translation.tagalog: Kaya naman siya this ano, coming 21.
translation.english: It can be settled this coming 21st.

translation.tagalog: This, February 21 po?
translation.english: This February 21?

translation.tagalog: Yes po, kasi po ayun po yung judicia ulit eh, so ipigil na po namin lahat
translation.english: Yes, because that’s the next payday, so we’ve held off everything else.

translation.tagalog: Opo, kasi ganito, Ma'am. Opo, yung once na na-delete kayo ng payment, automatic na nagkakombine yung 2-month amortization mo dyan sa dashboard mo.
translation.english: Okay, Ma'am. Once you miss a payment, the two-month amortizations automatically combine in your dashboard.

translation.tagalog: ng ano.
translation.english: Right.

translation.tagalog: But that doesn't mean naman po na kailangan mo siyang isettle kung ano po yung due date na nakikita mo na dyan sa dashboard ninyo.
translation.english: But that doesn’t mean you have to pay whatever is shown in the dashboard as the due date.

translation.tagalog: etics.com
translation.english: etics.com

translation.tagalog: Today kasi po, yung updated amount as per Maya na kailangan ninyong masettle po is 8,880.50 which is today nyo po siya kailangan masettle po para mag-update po yung account and mag-stop na po siya na magranas. And even though naman po na may kasama ito na principal due, gawa nga po na nag-rate payment tayo and na meron po siyang 0.17% daily po na penalty, makikredit pa rin naman po siya sa account nyo. Kailangan lang po talaga siyang masettle today po para mag-update po yung account and mag-stop na po siya na magranas.
translation.english: As of today, the updated amount you need to settle is 8,880.50, which must be settled today to update your account and stop it from accumulating more charges. Even though it includes principal due, because of late payment, there’s a daily penalty of 0.17%. But the amount will still be credited to your account. It just really needs to be settled today.

translation.tagalog: Okay po, sige po
translation.english: Okay, sure.

translation.tagalog: So kaya naman na po natin siyang isettle today, Ma'am?
translation.english: So will we be able to settle it today, Ma'am?

translation.tagalog: Yes po
translation.english: Yes.

translation.tagalog: Okay po. So mga what time po natin siya masisettle?
translation.english: Okay. Around what time will you be able to settle it?

translation.tagalog: Baka ngayon na
translation.english: Maybe now.

translation.tagalog: Right after the call po. Okay po. So gawan ko na lang din po siya ng report po. Give an email naman po natin dito is still active, jdong425 at gmail.com po.
translation.english: Right after the call? Alright. I’ll make a report. The email we have on file is still active, jdong425@gmail.com.

translation.tagalog: Ay wait lang, pwede ba siya ano Pwede ba siya sa Mamaya, ganon
translation.english: Oh wait, can it be done later instead?

translation.tagalog: Ano po?
translation.english: What’s that?

translation.tagalog: Pwede ba siya mamaya
translation.english: Can it be later?

translation.tagalog: Mamaya ang gabi po?
translation.english: Later this evening?

translation.tagalog: Yes po
translation.english: Yes.

translation.tagalog: Si Ma'am Daisy po ba itong kausap po?
translation.english: Is this Ma'am Daisy I'm speaking with?

translation.tagalog: Anak po
translation.english: Her child.

translation.tagalog: Anak po? Okay. Nasaan po si Ma'am Daisy?
translation.english: Her child? Okay. Where is Ma'am Daisy?

translation.tagalog: Wala po nasa tentahan po eh
translation.english: She’s at the store.

translation.tagalog: O po, si Ma'am Daisy po kasi sana yung kailangan makausap po. Nag-agree po kayo kanina na kayo po si Ma'am Daisy.
translation.english: I see. It’s just that we need to speak directly with Ma'am Daisy. Earlier you confirmed you were her.

translation.tagalog: Anak po
translation.english: Her child.

translation.tagalog: Kaya po nakapag-disclose kami.
translation.english: Which is why we disclosed information.

translation.tagalog: Anak po
translation.english: Her child.

translation.tagalog: Sige, ganito na lang siya. Hindi po kasi kami allowed mag-disclose po ng any information.
translation.english: Alright. In that case, we’re not allowed to disclose any information.

translation.tagalog: Anak po
translation.english: Her child.

translation.tagalog: Pasuin na lang po. Paralay na lang muna kami ng message. Na tumawag si Credit Max regarding lang po sa Maya Bank niya.
translation.english: We’ll just leave a message that Credit Max called regarding her Maya Bank account.

translation.tagalog: Anak po Anak po Anak po Anak po Anak po
translation.english: Her child. Her child. Her child. Her child. Her child.

translation.tagalog: And sa susunod na lang din po, once po na may magtanong sa inyo po kung si Ma'am Daisy na po,
translation.english: Also next time, if someone asks you if you're Ma'am Daisy, please confirm right away if you're not, so we won’t disclose any info.

translation.tagalog: Anak po
translation.english: Her child.

translation.tagalog: pa-verify na lang agad sir kung hindi po kayo. Para hindi na lang din po makapag-disclose ng any information po.
translation.english: To avoid disclosing anything without authorization.

translation.tagalog: Okay lang po yun Kasi ako din naman po Nagbibigay kay mommy Ng anong panuulog niya
translation.english: That’s fine. I’m the one helping my mom with her payments anyway.

translation.tagalog: Opo. Kasi sir, yung name po kasi ni Ma'am yung nakalagay po dito eh. So kung gusto niyo po na kayo po yung makausap namin sir, pwede naman po yan.
translation.english: Yes. But Ma'am Daisy’s name is the one registered here. If you'd prefer we speak with you instead, that’s possible.

translation.tagalog: Anak po Anak po
translation.english: Her child. Her child.

translation.tagalog: Kung halimbawa po nandyan si Ma'am sa kabilang line,
translation.english: If she’s on the other line, she can authorize you to speak on her behalf. Or she can send an authorization letter via email. That’s the protocol here. We can’t disclose anything without authorization.

translation.tagalog: Anak po
translation.english: Okay.

translation.tagalog: pwede naman po niya sabihin na in-authorize niya kayo na makausap po regarding dito. Or kung pwede rin po na mag-send siya ng authorization letter through email po. Kasi protocol din po talaga siya dito sir. Bawal po kami mag-disclose po ng any information hanggat wala pong authorization po.
translation.english: Alright. That’s all for now. Please relay the message that Credit Max called regarding her Maya Bank account. Thank you.

translation.english: Okay

translation.tagalog: Opo. So ayun na lang po muna today po. Kindly relay the message po na tumawag si Credit Max regarding lang po sa Maya Bank. Okay po. Thank you po.
